sourcesContent:
import { useState, memo } from "react"
import { Button, Drawer, DrawerContent, DrawerOverlay, DrawerHeader, DrawerBody, useDisclosure, Box, Text, Menu, MenuList, MenuGroup, MenuItem } from "@chakra-ui/react"
import { RiMenuFoldLine } from "react-icons/ri";

const MenuBar = memo(() => {
    const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()
    return (
        <>
            <Box w='70px' h='70px' cursor='pointer'>
                <Text letterSpacing='1px' fontWeight='600' mb='-5px' fontSize='15px'>MENU</Text>
                <RiMenuFoldLine onClick={onOpen} size='50px' />
            </Box>
            <Drawer placement='right' onClose={onClose} isOpen={isOpen}>
                <DrawerOverlay />
                <DrawerContent>
                <DrawerHeader borderBottomWidth="1px">MENU</DrawerHeader>
                <DrawerBody>
                    <Menu>
                        <MenuList>
                            <MenuGroup title="Profile">
                            <MenuItem>My Account</MenuItem>
                            <MenuItem>Payments </MenuItem>
                            </MenuGroup>
                            <MenuDivider />
                            <MenuGroup title="Help">
                            <MenuItem>Docs</MenuItem>
                            <MenuItem>FAQ</MenuItem>
                            </MenuGroup>
                        </MenuList>
                    </Menu>
                </DrawerBody>
                </DrawerContent>
            </Drawer>
        </>
    )
})

export default MenuBar
